name: BounCoursePlanner
description: Course schedule planner for Boğaziçi University students. Finds the best schedule, which has the less conflicts and most free hours they want.

name: BUEvents
description: Events calendar for Boğaziçi University. It's the only events calendar since there isn't any official one.

name: BUYemek
description: An iOS app for Boğaziçi University's cafeteria. There is also a separate project for its REST API.

name: SkateMate
description:
SkateMate enables skaters to find and share new spots, and connect with each other in real-time. It was our ENG 493 - Launching a Successful Software Startup course project in 2016 Fall term, at Boğaziçi University.
I was responsible for the development of the mobile application (cross-platform, built with Ionic).

name: Wower
description:
An app for cyber attack protection which protects the user's files and tracks the attacker. Built by WowTeam for COMODO & COMPEC Hackathon at Boğaziçi University and won the 1st prize.
I was responsible for the development of the desktop app (Electron, Node.js, AngularJS) and its RESTful API (Ruby on Rails).

name: WowDoor
description: An IoT device that gives the ability to lock & unlock doors with a smartphone. Built by sudoers team for IoT Hackathon at Boğaziçi University, won the 1st prize.

name: EngelsizMenu
description: Accessible, easy-to-use restaurant menu app for blind and visually impaired. I was responsible for the development of the RESTful API and iOS application.

name: dekrypt
description: A command-line tool for automatic decryption/decipher of a number of encryption/cipher algorithms.

name: IlanTakip
description: Automatic tracking system for some real-estate listing sites in Turkey.
